2102.08235.sentence: We found that while sensing OFF enabled couples to keep in touch, sensing ON enabled easier and more authentic communication that fostered social connection.

2102.08235.sentence: To understand their role in communication, we created Significant Otter, an Apple Watch/iPhone app that enables romantic partners to share and respond to each others biosignals in the form of animated otter avatars.
